name: Stickman RPG - Idle Money Clicker
description:
Addicting Stickman Warriors Idle Incremental Clicker, get money/cash and buy various Upgrades. Game is simple, You need tap shield, before weapon hit Your Stickman, it will generate Your income, begin Your RPG adventure. Find formula for fastest upgrade. It is a game for boys, for girls, for kids and adults. This app is Free to download.

This free game is not a boring Company simulator, here You need get things in Your hands, become hero, which will fight various monsters in Town/City (Orc, werewolf, troll, spider and a lot more), buy special power-ups, and become rich. Climate like in dungeon RPG. No gun fight, no archer battle, only beautiful magic spells. Grab swords and sandals and get into arena

Every city and building, town, reactor made by human got destroyed. Dismounting City has End. From Miner to Cookie confectioner and spinner, they had all die. Human was builder of earth, now it's time for Stickmans. Time for Revenge, Legacy of Stickmans, start war. Become mage, warrior or paladin

- Tap and avoid getting hit by a weapon (kunai, stick, rock, rocket, grenade, shuriken and a lot more), upgrade weapons.
- Upgrade Your Hero Character with skill points, raise Your attack/defense with skill points. Chose Your specialization. Train Your character, become legend, fighter.
- Buy new equipment (swords, shields, helmets, new characters), and upgrade them.
- Battle Various monsters (Troll, Ogre, Stickmans, Spider, skeleton), and a lot more.
'- Buy upgrades, which raise Your income, join economy war adventure.
- Idle and Offline profit. Explore game universe
- And a lot more.

Relax and play this game, and make fortune, become billionaire. Gameplay is casual and simple, tapping will grant You cash income, which you can invest into endless upgrades. Stick earn You money in real life time, each second grant a new cash income.
